humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there is one metastatic carcinoma present in the axillary lymph node with a size of 0.4 cm. Based on the AJCC staging system, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that one axillary lymph node was found to have metastatic carcinoma, with no evidence of extracapsular extension. This corresponds to a pathologic N1 stage.
